java/liquibase/database/sql/ReorganizeTableStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00006 
00007 public class ReorganizeTableStatement implements SqlStatement {
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String tableName;
00010 
00011     public ReorganizeTableStatement(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00012         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00013         this.tableName = tableName;
00014     }
00015 
00016     public String getSchemaName() {
00017         return schemaName;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getTableName() {
00021         return tableName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00025         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00026             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Cannot reorganize table", this, database);
00027         }
00028         return "CALL SYSPROC.ADMIN_CMD ('REORG TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + "')";
00029     }
00030 
00031     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00032         return ";";
00033     }
00034 
00035     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00036         return database instanceof DB2Database;
00037     }
00038 }
